name: AmbientVisions-RelaxingVideos
0:
”Alexa, open Ambient Visions”
”Alexa, start Ambient Visions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient visions
des:
Get thousands of hours of cozy fireplaces, oceans, beaches and thunderstorm videos, dreamscapes, VJ loops, space videos and more for all your Alexa screen devices such as Echo Show, Fire TV and Tablet. Ambient Visions® offers seamlessly looping ambient videos paired with relaxing sounds and hundreds of hours of easy listening music. Let it play when you want to calm down, focus, relax and sleep. You can play most videos of this Skill for free for an entire hour.

For more details, visit www.amvi.tv or look up Ambient Visions on Youtube, Instagram, Facebook and X, formerly Twitter.

AVAILABLE VIDEOS
--------------------------------
- Underwater World (100+ videos)
- Fireplaces (60+ videos)
- Ocean Views (40+ videos)
- Beach Views (60+ videos)
- Lakes, Waterfalls & Rivers (80+ videos)
- Motion screens, Ambient Art (80+ videos)
- Dreamscapes (40+ videos)
- Rain videos (60+ videos)
- Thunderstorms (18 videos)
- Fish tanks (20 videos)
- Scenic Rides by car and on train (40 videos)
- Wildlife, Jungle (40+ videos)
- Outer Space (50+ videos)
- Bedtime stories & lullabies (60 videos)
- VJ Loops & Disco Tunnels (80+ videos)
- Seasonal: Christmas, Halloween, Winter (80+ videos)
- Meditation (40+ videos)
- and many many more ...

PREMIUM 
--------------------------------
You can sign up to Ambient Visions® Premium to unlock even more features and videos:
- MORE VIDEOS: unlimited access to over 1300 Ambient Visions® videos
- PLAY LONGER: play videos for up to 12 hours straight
- BEST QUALITY: watch all videos in even higher quality.
- ROUTINES: to start video automatically, all videos can be added to your Alexa routines.
- MORE FEATURES: unlocks features like rewinding and muting videos.
- NO ADS: Videos play on full screen without an Ad-bar

For help and feedback please reach out to team @ ambientvisions.tv

PLEASE NOTE: To use this Skill you need an Alexa screen device like an Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV or Fire Tablet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
